elements.title: Infogrid
elements.description: The platform gathers data from a variety of sensors placed throughout buildings in order to assist property managers reduce energy costs by detecting overuse of refrigeration, detecting leaks and improving employee productivity and well-being. Raised 90M in [April 2023](https://siliconangle.com/2023/04/11/ai-driven-building-monitoring-startup-infogrid-raises-90m/)

elements.title: Sero
elements.description: Cardiff based B2B platform that provides property owners and developers with a set of steps to achieving a carbon zero portfolio of homes. Raised 7M in April 2023, [in the news](https://siliconcanals.com/news/startups/cardiffs-sero-bags-6-8m/)

elements.title: Span
elements.description: Extends the functionality of the electric panel with some extra smarts targeted at one of the most power-hungry devices in a modern home: the electric vehicle. Raised 90M in [April 2022](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-03-22/renewable-energy-startup-span-io-raises-90-million-in-funding) and another 90M in April 2023

elements.title: Verdigris
elements.description: Verdigris helps building owners and managers save time and increase net operating income (NOI). Our AI learns your building’s energy patterns, and automatically adjusts HVAC controls throughout the day to save you 20-30% in energy costs.

elements.title: Kode labs
elements.description: Smart Building Software for portfolio management. On a mission to Build the most intuitive, easy to use real estate software products that enable sustainability, operational efficiencies and comfort.

elements.title: Grid edge
elements.description: UK based Grid Edge transforms existing building into digital twin and data-driven insights help reduce energy demand with efficiency savings and improved operations and control. They want to change the way that people use energy by putting data-driven, intelligent control into the hands of commercial energy consumers. Has [raised 2.5M in Oct 19](https://www.bp.com/en/global/corporate/news-and-insights/press-releases/bp-expands-its-digital-energy-portfolio-by-investing-in-energy-management-platform-grid-edge.html) from BP Ventures

elements.title: Measurable Energy
elements.description: We created the measurable.energy (m.e) Platform from the ground up to offer facilities managers, building owners and occupants with real-time energy and GHG emissions monitoring, automated controls, and data driven actions to avoid carbon emissions. Raised [5M in Jan 2023](https://www.finsmes.com/2023/01/measurable-energy-raises-4-5m-in-series-a-funding.html)

elements.title: Passive Logic
elements.description: Sensors and actuators with a software platform that automates the whole building life cycle. [Keyframe capital](https://www.keyframecapital.com/) has invested in them

elements.title: Buildings IOT
elements.description: We develop and deploy cloud-based building analytics software, we implement complex Integrated Building Management Systems, we design and install controls systems, we maintain building assets and we provide IT managed services.

elements.title: Metrikus
elements.description: Metrikus is a platform that helps to make buildings more efficient. Implemented at Met Office HQ, [in the news](https://www.twinfm.com/article/monitoring-energy-usage-at-met-office-hq)

elements.title: Dabbel
elements.description: Buildings, self-driven. The DABBEL AI reduces your building’s HVAC energy consumption and CO₂ emissions by up to 40%. Based in Dusseldorf

elements.title: Volttron
elements.description: Volttron is a flexible, scalable, economical and secure software platform to operate the Internet of Things developed at Pacific Northwest National Laboratory and available as an open-source tool. The U.S. Department of Energy views the technology as a central component of buildings-grid integration, and provides funding support. [Github repo](https://github.com/VOLTTRON/volttron)

elements.title: Ecopilot
elements.description: Improve the working environment, improve productivity – Our clients/customers describe Ecopilot® and as an Artificial Intelligence that enables our various systems to collaborate, rather than constantly working against each other.

elements.title: Arbnco
elements.description: building performance software platform for utilities, national property managers and commercial real estate.

elements.title: Amber
elements.description: discreet solid-state board for power control. Raised $8.5M in Feb 2021, from [crunchbase](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/amber-series-b-funding/)

elements.title: GridIO
elements.description: device for household virtual power plant, monitors and controls energy consumption to optimise on tariffs and carbon emissions. Finalists at free electrons 2020

elements.title: Passivesystems
elements.description: Passivsystems mission is to create sustainable value through the use of smart technology within the residential energy supply market.

elements.title: Vector NZ
elements.description: New Zealand's largest distributor of electricity and gas. Vector and Amazon Web Services (AWS) are jointly developing a New Energy Platform (NEP) under a multi-year strategic alliance to change how energy is managed, delivered and consumed.

elements.title: Bee Bryte
elements.description: software-as-a-service minimizing utility bills with automatic control of heating-cooling equipment (e.g. HVAC), pumps, EV charging points and/or batteries. Based in Lyon and Singapore.

elements.title: Haven Power
elements.description: Part of the [Drax Group](https://www.drax.com/about-us/) (suppliers of low-carbon energy), Haven Power is a business utility suitable for users over 50,000 kWh of electricity each year.

elements.title: Device Pilot
elements.description: Service monitoring for connected devices: the process of collecting streams of data from individual devices, turning them into metrics, and from those deriving Key Performance Indicators for your device estate as a whole

elements.title: Guru Systems
elements.description: Guru Systems  improves the performance of heat networks, their technology is for people who want to deliver and operate heat networks

elements.title: EcoSync Energy
elements.description: EcoSync Energy  have created a cloud-based platform for existing building technologies like the room booking system and heating control to synchronise and communicate so as to provide heating for occupied areas only.

elements.title: 75f
elements.description: 75f  is a IoT smart HVAC solution makes commercial buildings more comfortable and energy efficient. Funded by [breakthrough energy ventures](https://www.gatesnotes.com/Energy/Buildings-are-good-for-people-and-bad-for-the-climate)

elements.title: Control 4
elements.description: Control 4  is one of the leading home automation systems with plenty of upscale different devices. Quite new to energy efficiency though, worth [a check](https://www.control4.com/blog/456/energyefficient-home-controls-lighting-and-solar-with-a-hightech-twist)

elements.title: Syscom
elements.description: Syscom  is a Centrica company that creates tailored and custom-made solutions in the engineering, software, commissioning and maintenance of Building Energy Management Systems. Manufacturer of a [wireless meter](https://syscombms.com/wireless-metering/)

elements.title: Tridium
elements.description: Tridium  owned by Honeywell International deleoping IoT for business applications, creators of the Niagara framework that also has a [marketplace](https://www.niagaramarketplace.com/marketplace_home)

elements.title: Innovelec
elements.description: Innovelec  custom design and implementation of IoT solutions mainly in UK

elements.title: Asema
elements.description: Asema  is a smart-energy iot platform with sensors and dashboards, not sure it's on the market already. They also have an [open API](http://www.smart-api.io/)

elements.title: Gridduck
elements.description: Gridduck  UK based cloud energy management platform with devices developed on top of Develco (see above). Listed for winning 360k in funding for gamification of EV charging in the south-korea collaboration, [link](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/funding-for-innovative-smart-energy-systems) founder and CEO is [Gregor](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gregor-hoefter-8bb77/)

elements.title: Netatmo
elements.description: Netatmo  smart thermostat, air quality monitor, smoke detector, radiator valves, indoor / outdoor camera

elements.title: Lightwave rf
elements.description: Lightwave rf  controlled and connected power sockets, switches, sensors, radiator valves. They claim to do energy monitoring, but haven't found anything on website.

elements.title: Develco
elements.description: Develco  Denmark based, gateway, controlled socket, relays, pass through, sensors. All Zigbee connected, quite amazing

elements.title: Nest
elements.description: Nest  notoriously bought by Google, started as thermostat only, progressively expanded to smart home

elements.title: Hive
elements.description: Hive  smart home device range, started with thermostat, bought by Centrica / British Gas

elements.title: Home Connect
elements.description: Home Connect  is the iot very proprietary platform by Bosch, device management and optimisation with a set of selected partners

elements.title: MyEnergi
elements.description: MyEnergi  developing green products for home and business, recently awarded a BEIS contract for domestic DSR [source: the energyst](https://theenergyst.com/domestic-demand-side-response-8-6m-competition-winners-announced/)

elements.title: Open Sensors
elements.description: OpenSensors provides a smart Building Management System with sensors and analytics tools analyse effective use of your space.

elements.title: IoT Systems Group
elements.description: IoT Systems Group is a Company passionate about delivering the best in Industry 4.0 technology to the UK and MENA markets.

elements.title: Best Energy
elements.description: Best wants To optimise buildings globally, by harnessing the power of the Internet of Things (IoT), Big Data and Artificial Intelligence (AI). To forge a built environment that is more energy-efficient, more sustainable and more pleasing to work and live in.
